resources.string: In the following screen, please make sure that ESMira is allowed to run in the background and is able to start when rebooting the phone. Unfortunately the names of the settings (and which settings actually exist) vary greatly between phone models and we do not have any screenshots for this phone model to assist you further. So please try to guess the appropriate settings. If you want to help us out and send us some screenshots, please contact the App developer (esmira@kl.ac.at).\n\nAfter you are done, press the back-key on your phone to return to this screen.
In the upcoming screen find ESMira in the list of apps and make sure it has the permission to Autostart.
In the following screen, please find ESMira in the list of apps and make sure it is \"Manually managed\".
In the upcoming screen make sure ESMira has the permission for \"Auto-Launch\" and \"Run in background\".
In the upcoming screen wait until \"Checking\" is complete and scroll down to the bottom of the page.
At the bottom of the page select on \"Unmonitored apps\".
In the following screen press the \"Add apps\" button. Then select ESMira in the list and press \"OK\".
In the upcoming screen select \"Battery optimization\".
Then open the dropdown menu and select \"All apps\".
Now search the list for \"ESMira\", click on it, select \"Don\'t optimize\" and press \"Done\".
Now search the list for \"ESMira\", and make sure that the checkbox is enabled.
After you are done, press the back-key on your phone to return to this screen.
Were you able to adjust the settings as instructed?
Opens an option menu for this study.
Change the schedules of your studies
Update the settings of your studies
Do you want to delete all statistics for this study?
Do you want to leave this study? You will have to reenter its credentials to join again.
A critical update was found. Please update ESMira in the app store.
Please fill out all required fields!
You have not selected any images to upload.
Unfortunately some smartphone models have hidden settings which are necessary to allow background notifications.
ESMira is not able not send notifications!
In case this dialog is not helpful to you, you can also visit dontkillmyapp.com for more information.
Do you need further assistance or you want to help us to incorporate more information (Screenshots, descriptions) on your device model into ESMira? Write us an email to: esmira@kl.ac.at.
The following device settings were found for your phone:
Please choose a bigger time window!
Do you have any information that could help us?
Please help us solving your problem and send this error report to us. Thank you!
To ensure that ESMira can issue notifications from the background, some special settings are necessary for your phone model. Tap \"Open device specific setup\" below to open your phone settings.
Could not find public studies on this server.
Could not find studies with the access key \"%1$s\" on this server.
You have not joined any study.
No questionnaires available at the moment…

Please make sure that 
[1] your phone is not muted, 
[2] notifications for ESMira are enabled and 
[3] "Do not disturb"-mode (if available on your phone) is disabled:

It is very likely that your phone will not be able to receive notifications for this study. Your phone may have special settings that we are not aware of. Please contact the researcher of the study or the app developer (and mention the phone model you are using) to find a solution for your problem.
Your changes will take effect after one day.
The configuration has been completed. You can now click on \"Participate\" to join the study.
Your schedules have been reset due to an update to the study.
Press \"Send test notification\" to test if your phone can receive notification messages.
There was an error while updating your studies
In order to continue, please read the informed consent and agree.
Notifications are used to invite you to fill out questionnaires at set times. You will not receive any notifications anymore when the study has ended.
Please press \"Enable notifications\" to check if ESMira has the permission to send notifications.
This is a test notification to make sure that ESMira can actually send notifications.

Studies can send reminder to fill out questionnaires at specific times of the day. Most of the times, these notifications are important for studies to properly function. Please do not disable this notification channel.
Sends a notification when a researcher has sent you a new message regarding an ongoing study.
Sends a notification when a study was updated in case you want to change its notification schedules.
Only visible when the study has ended.
Do you have an access key?
Do you really want to cancel?
In order to use ESMira, you have to join a study first.

Welcome to ESMira, the anonymous Questionnaire Assistant. 
 
In order to start please select a study and join. 
This dialog will assist you.
Do you have a QR code for a study?
Please place the QR code about 30 cm away in front of your smartphone camera so that it is visible on the screen. \nESMira will scan the code automatically as soon as the camera has focused.
On which server is the study located?
This study needs permission for usage access. Please make sure, that ESMira is enabled in the permission screen and then press the back button on your phone.

Some questionnaires of this study track the usage times for specific apps (or the smartphone in general) over the course of the last day. This data will NOT be accessed in the background and is ONLY saved when you send the according questionnaire. Before sending the questionnaire you will be informed if and which data is sent.
This feature is not supported on your phone
